database.name: VIEW FIN_PAYMENT_EXEC_HISTORY_V
database.view: SELECT prp.fin_payment_run_payment_id AS fin_payment_exec_history_v_id, prp.fin_payment_id, prp.ad_client_id, prp.ad_org_id, prp.created, prp.createdby, prp.updated, prp.updatedby, prp.isactive, prp.created AS executiondate, pr.fin_payment_run_id, pr.message AS prun_message, pr.status AS prun_status, pr.run_source AS prun_source, prp.result AS paymentexec_result, prp.message AS paymentexec_message FROM fin_payment_run pr JOIN fin_payment_run_payment prp ON pr.fin_payment_run_id = prp.fin_payment_run_id
